intro: I am a Computer Engineering student at the University of British Columbia, expecting to graduate in April 2022.
desc: Over the course of my undergraduate degree. I started a registered Canadian non-profit organization, co-founded a mental health platform serving 8000+ students/staff, completed various different internships/full-time opportunities holding positions such as Agile Developer, Technical Project Coordinator, Sales Manager, and Administrative Intern, competed and won awards at hackathons and other events, and most importantly, met wonderful people who I now consider my best friends
